name: A Zombie Mall Defence Tower 8bit Pixel Game
name_original: A Zombie Mall Defence Tower 8bit Pixel Game
description:
The goal is to survive! Zombies have attacked and you have to defend yourself in your Mall! How long will you last?

Strategy is key if you are to fight your way past hordes of Zombies in this EPIC Tower Defence based game!

Compete with friends in the survival tournaments and find out who really would survive the longest!

Featuring:
- Drag and drop player controls
- Archer Cheerleaders! Old dudes with Guns! Firemen with Axes (This games got everything!) and many more players to choose from
- 8bit Pixel graphics!
- Single player & Survival modes
